1.content:
The ninja world is full of opportunity and now, today is the day that my story is open to all the people out there so feel free to make your story as bloody as possible because I care.

I am now allowing for a crossover in any story you want but you're limited to three other shows thrown in at a time.
1.title: The start of a beginning

11.content: Let's get started with this shall we? I want to cover some of the characters so you may pick who you wish to follow.
11.title: Naruto

111.content: The village of konoha, a peaceful village full of potential ninja and doesn't get involved in any wars unless you count fighting an evil organization named Akatsuki, trying to find a crazy ninja who wants immortality, and a team member who is out for revenge against his brother so much he joins the bad guy wars but not involved in any none the less. The story takes place after Naruto fails his previous mission to get a lead on Sasuke. He is angry that when ever he comes so close, something always screws it up. He is very angry with himself but he refuses to give up. Naruto fails to realize that going after Sakura as a love interest is impossible and can never be done but there is only one person who can break him from his cycle and her name is Hinata
111.title: Any person from series

choices: Naruto suddenly doesn't seem to like Sakura as much as he use to.
Naruto gets a crazy dream about Hinata.
Hinata comes front to tell him her feelings and almost fails
1111.content: Naruto is what one would call the "unexpected ninja" he has this ability to never give up in battle and can pull through in a pinch but recently, he has been having love troubles with Sakura. He rarely gets a good comment by Sakura unless he turns the tide of battle. She also scolds him a lot on stuff that happens by coincidence by punching him in the face and he barely gets respect until she starts to be a little nicer to him but not enough to like him. Naruto is constantly held down by fate's weight and no matter how high he jumps, he'll never reach his goal however fate has something else in store for him. Hinata just so happens to like Naruto but can't express her feelings because whenever he is too close, she faints on the spot. Naruto has never noticed her feelings until one day...
1111.title: Follow Naruto's story

11112.content: Naruto had finished his most recent mission and he feels he one step closer to Sasuke. He decides to turn in for the day. As he was sleeping, something strange happened but it wasn't outside that was this was happening but on the inside or more specifically, Naruto's dream. He suddenly gets this strange dream of Hinata coming up to him and revealing her feelings for him. She then proceeds to tell him about how her feelings came about and that she wants to be with him forever. She then removes her clothing and says "You can do anything you want with me." Naruto was not only surprised, he was dumbfounded. He never realized that there was a person who liked him right next to him. Naruto wakes up in a sweat and then says "I have to find her." Naruto ran out of his house even though it was pitch black. He looked around for Hinata and he couldn't find her anywhere. Naruto was about to give up but then he remembered one place he hadn't check. He then rushed there to find the girl he was looking for. He stood at the place where Team 7 was officially called a team so long ago. He saw a girl leaning against a wooden post and he approached her to see...
11112.title: Realization in its purest form

112.content:
Tayuya sat in front of the door…on the other side was the kid who had brought her back to life. She felt the seal on her stomach rise…she wondered if it was because she was close to him, like Orochimaru-sama said.
Tayuya remembered losing to that fucking Shadow-nin. If she ever saw that bastard again he was a dead man…
She hadn’t sacrificed everything in Sunagakure just to die in some kami forsaken Konoha forest. She left Suna to become strong…to get away from her brothers and her overbearing sister. She was here to prove to them all how powerful she could really become…and one day she would show Suna just what they lost by ostracizing her.
Tayuya wasn’t used to owing anyone anything…she remembered when Sakon saved her life from that Taki-nin. She had had to wait nearly a year to pay him back, she didn’t owe anyone except Orochimaru-sama. She had given him her freedom…he had given her power.
She put her hand on the doorknob to her room…the Konoha-nin had been moved there; it wasn’t Sasuke-sama. She wondered who it was…who had sacrificed everything for Sasuke-sama to stay in Konoha?
Orochimaru-sama hadn’t even seemed angry about losing Sasuke-sama’s kekkei genkai. Then again Kimimaro, fucking bone bastard, was alive again…all the sound five ninjas were alive again.
She opened the door…while she was grateful to whoever this Leaf-nin was, she didn’t like being a babysitter. Orochimaru-sama had given all of his remaining elite guards a week to rest, she had looked forward to some sleep and training but baby sitting someone…
Tayuya opened the door to her candlelit room…so it was that loud-mouthed blonde…he was a Jinchuriki? He had a lot of friends for a Jinchuriki…everything Tayuya knew from her experiences told her Jinchuriki were loners.
But then again if Orochimaru-sama was going to save them from Akatsuki…
Her room looked just like she remembered it…stone walls, minimal furniture, candlelight…wonderful. She looked around a corner and saw her clawfoot tub with it’s faucet was still there, along with the washbowl and mirror and the small toilet.
She looked over and saw the Blonde was sweating and convulsing…according to Kabuto he was weak from giving so much of his demonic chakra and that combined with the Cursed Seal…
He was in her bed…sweating everywhere…fucking kid…
“You little bastard…” she cursed under her breath. Not that her room was fit for royalty or anything but it was hers…she liked the claw foot tub in her bathroom, her chest of drawers, her weapons... And this cute kid could die on her bed…she didn’t just say that.
The covers were pulled down so that he was “protected” below his navel. The seal she had on her stomach was also on his…except it was flared red. He had her Cursed Seal…where his left shoulder met his neck…it also had a circular design over it, like an interwoven crown of thorns.
This kid was weak…
“Hey…Hey kid…” She was being a shithead and she knew it. Hell she had bit through the stick she had put in her mouth when Orochimaru-sama gave her the Cursed Seal. She shook him awake…
He opened one eye…she saw he had goosebumps all over his body. He was doing better than she had…
“Don’t die on my bed…”
He took a shuddering breath, she thought he might have chuckled…Tayuya couldn’t believe he was able to stay conscious.
“T-this…I-is…y-your…r-room?” He managed to grit through the pain.
Tayuya nodded. She went over to her drawers…she lit some more candles and pulled over her rickety wooden chair, if she was going to have to baby-sit... Hell this kid would need at least a day…possibly two or more, and when he woke up out of Cursed Seal coma he was going to be super pissy.
“S-So…y-you’re…a-alive…then?” He was drawing, short quick breaths and speaking in short spurts. She was so surprised he was able to talk…that she didn’t scold him for sounding like a retarded baka…
“Yes…apparently Orochimaru-sama was able to use your demon chakra to bring me back. I guess…” She scoffed. “I owe you.” She waited for the inevitable, idiotic macho bullshit she always got from the men in Orochimaru-sama’s ranks.
“Y-You…don’t…o-owe…m-me…anything.” His speech was improving, he was already getting closer to taking full breaths. If Kabuto-sempai was right, this kid had only had his seal for eight hours… “I-I wanted to d-do that…” His eyes clenched for a moment and he let out a long huff.
This kid was strange…his shaggy blonde hair was everywhere. He was a runt…probably small downstairs to match.
Tayuya wasn’t a whore…but she had slept around. Mostly with various ninja who caught her eye and weren’t bullshit trash ninja…but none of the Sound Four. Gross. It was really an empty act…all it really did was scratch an itch, nothing more.
“So you wanted to please Orochimaru-sama?” she said offhandedly. She took off her beanie and ran her fingers through her hair. She wondered when he would pass out from the sheer pain wracking through his body.
He shook his head…he took a quick breath. Tayuya noticed his beautiful blue eyes…she didn’t just say that.
“N-No…I don’t l-like to see people die, e-especially when it’s p-partly m-my fault.”
Tayuya looked at him…this kid had went to get the Uchiha back, what did he mean it was his fault?
“What do you mean your…”
The kid was out…Tayuya hadn’t noticed the whiskery scars on his face. Probably an influence of his demon…she wondered which one was sealed within his body. Orochimaru-sama had already said he was going to use the “New” Sound Four to take on Akatsuki…they were soon going to have special training in order to handle the S-Ranked ninja. Tayuya was actually excited…three years of growth would be good for her.
She winced…the chakra medicine was already kicking in. Orochimaru-sama’s medicine…it was going to permanently triple her own chakra stores…
Tayuya studied her roommate…she was apparently going to have to take care of him for a while. She hoped Kabuto-sempai could find him his own room…she didn’t like him here…
“I want my bed back…” she said out loud to the unconscious Leaf-nin.
Tayuya fell asleep in the chair…soothed to sleep…she was alive…
When Tayuya awoke…he wasn’t there. Her bed was warm…
She got up and walked over to the bathroom…she remembered Sakon saying he pissed blood when his infection spread.
The Blonde was nowhere in her room…as she came out of her bathroom, she realized she stepped on her undersheet. What?
Their was one of her two pillows on the floor…this didn’t make any sense. That small runt had put her in the bed and slept on the floor? What the fuck was wrong with this Leaf-nin.
He had obviously taken a bath and cleaned up but the toilet seat was down and her tub was spotless.
Tayuya just shook her head and crawled back into bed. She was off this week…she was alive…sleep called to her.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------
“Uchiha Sasuke…” Tsunade said. The heavily bandaged, but walking Uchiha looked at her. His left eye was covered along with both legs and arms and chest. Tsunade smiled to herself, she was dehydrated from all the tears she had cried over the Blonde leaving, but at least he had beat the hell out of the Uchiha.
“I’ve decided to clear you of the charges the Elder Council had brought against you…Treachery, Dereliction of Duty, etc…”
Uchiha Sasuke nodded. He did look pathetic mummified in those linen bandages…Tsunade had never seen Uchiha pride take such a huge blow…
“You owe Kakashi and Sakura big time…if they hadn’t pleaded your case I was more than willing to shove your ass in prison for a year or the rest of your life.”
The Uchiha again nodded…
“But…you’re going to do something for me…”
He looked up at her…
“I understand why you made the decision you did…I’ve already arranged for Jiraiya to train you, a Sannin, for at least two years. You’re going to need it…because it’s your sole responsibility to get Naruto back.”
Sasuke looked up at her…
“This comes even before Itachi…do you hear me? I…” Tsunade held back tears… “want…him…back. I don’t care what you do…I don’t care how you do it…even if it causes a political disaster get him back…”
“Itachi…” The Uchiha said firmly.
Tsunade sighed. “The closer you get to Naruto…is the closer you get to Itachi. Your brother is after him remember…Naruto is your best bet at getting to Itachi. But you’re not ready for Itachi yet anyway…you would have to be as strong as Jiraiya just to attempt it.”
Sasuke looked away…
Tsunade looked at him…she really couldn’t understand everything Sasuke went through. That was Naruto’s job…Kakashi had told her how lonely Naruto had been when he was little.
“I’ll get that strong then…” Tsunade saw the Uchiha clench his fist that wasn’t in a sling.
“I’ve already informed Kakashi of this and he plans on forming a team platoon that will go after Naruto. You will be a part of that team…Kakashi didn’t want you but…”
Sasuke nodded. “Hai…is there anything else?”
Tsunade hated this kid. “No…dismissed.”
Sakura sat outside of the office, she kept pulling on her skirt…her own nervousness and denial eating away at her from the inside out.
She felt so guilty…and it wasn’t for the right reasons.
She wanted to tell herself that she missed Naruto…that she cared that he was gone. She wanted so desperately do believe that she was sad he went so far to keep his promise…
But she wasn’t….she had never been happier in her life. Sasuke followed her around constantly…and always wanted to train with her, to be with her. Last night it had rained and he wouldn’t let her leave the Uchiha Mansion to go home…he had made her sleep in his bed while he slept on the floor.
She knew it was probably because she was really the only friend he had left. None of their other peers even spoke to the Uchiha anymore…the ostracized him. Shikamaru had even said to his face that Konoha got the short end of the stick in Naruto’s pact with Otogakure. But even though it might all be empty she loved the attention…
Sasuke actually spoke to her a lot now…he had even held her hand the other day…
Sasuke shut the door to the Hokage’s office and looked over at her. The injured Uchiha smiled a small smile…
“I’m not going to jail…”
Sakura ran over and hugged him tightly…he let out a grunt.
“Oh…sorry…”
“It’s fine Sakura…“
There was a silence and Sakura smiled at him…glad she wouldn’t have to visit her crush in prison.
“I’ll walk you home.” Sasuke said.
Sakura went over and linked arms with Sasuke’s uninjured one…she nearly exploded inside when she saw him blush a little.
112.title: Any person from series

113.content:
I’m not sure how it started. Hell I’m not even sure when it started. But it happened. I’m not exactly pleased. But then again, I’m not displeased either. Lee, as fond of the little green bundle of sunshine that he is, he’s not my type. Don’t you dare say it’s because I believe him to look strange. That’s not it. I deeply admire his hard working attitude, his strength, but believe it or not..He’s dull. Okay I know that sounds really stupid and ignorant since my other teammate is Neji, but he really is dull. All he ever talks about is training, Sakura, beating a genius, and did I already mention training? Don’t even get me started on Neji. If you think Neji is a silent calm collected warrior, you’re as wrong as seeing your grandparents go at it in your own bed. Don’t ask. I already burned the sheets… Back to Neji. He’s not as quiet as you think. He’s got one hell of a mouth. He has nothing against putting down others harshly. His sarcastic tongue has even made Gai-sensei bow his head in shame. He’ll pick you apart. Shredding you piece by piece. Half of his battles he won through his mouth. That Byakugan of his even makes it easier for him to tear his opponent’s ego to ribbons. I’ll admit it though. I did have a crush on him. Can you blame me? Top of the class, hansom, fiercely strong… In the beginning I went so far as deluding myself saying every harsh word from Neji to Lee was to spur Lee to work harder. I was such a fool. But he’s mellowed out some. Ever since his fight with….Naruto. The short little blondie resting aginst my bare fee. Its so odd how his name just slides out of my mouth like I’ve known him for so long. Even though I have, but nothing more than a “Hello” and “How you are you” every few months. That does not really equal to knowing someone. Meh. I think I first heard of his name nearing the end of my first year of a being a Genin. My team and Gai-sensei just came back from the forest after looking for a pendant some old fool dropped. Took a long, long time.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------
“Gai-Sensei!”
“Yes Lee!”
“Look!” He pointed to the Hokage Monument. “Somebody painted graffiti all over the Lord Hokage’s faces? Who could be so irresponsible, who could be so reckless who cold be so-“
“WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU’RE DOING, YOU IDIOT? GET DOWN FROM THERE AND GET BACK TO CLASS!” Some Chuunin we didn’t know yelled. Sounded really motherly though
“Whoever he is, he certainly has odd taste in clothes.” Neji said sounding slightly amused, Byakugan activated staring in that general direction. “Orange jump suit, if I didn’t know any better I’d say he was trying to get Gai-sensei’s attention. Someone should tell him he’s got the wrong color.” He finished in a sneer. I suppressed a giggled. But not at what Neji said, but at what this stranger had done. It made the Monument so less boring looking. It wasn’t that funny but when your old academy class didn’t even have one comedian, and then teamed up with those three, looking at a blank piece of paper was fairly amusing. The giggle turned into a laugh. The laugh multiplied.Soon enough I was rolling around on the ground with tears coming out of my eyes. Gai-sensei had the nerve to look at me funny. I quickly recomposed myself and said, “I think I know who did that. Only one person could have done that…I think his name was Uzumaki Naruto.” Gai-sensei visibly stiffened. “A few months ago somebody had poured water on almost every singly toilet paper in the public restrooms. Even the spares. Everybody was fuming and the name Uzumaki Naruto was whispered all over the place.” I neglected to mention how everyone seem to really detest him for doing something so trivial, and even went as far as calling him a demon. I just thought he did stuff like that all the time.
“Ah Uzumaki Naruto..” Gai-sensei started, “If you see him say hi to him every now and then. He’s a good kid. Just a tad lonely.”

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------------
The three of us never did heed his words. Lee, Neji, and I were walking to our team’s meeting spot and passed by the academy. It was already after 6 pm for crying out loud, but Gai-sensei said it was important. I didn’t expect anyone to be there but when I first looked to the swing I saw someone, in orange on the swings all by himself. I felt like I knew the person but the name just couldn’t pop up. From what I could see, he had blonde spikes and was wearing a jumpsuit that was a mixture of orange, blue, and white. Lee said something.
“Did you say something Lee-kun?” I asked.
“No, never mind..”
“Hey guys do you recognize that person by the swings?” As I turned to look by the swings the person vanished.
“Tenten, what are you talking about? You must be seeing things.” Neji, clearly annoyed.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------
I met him again at the Chuunin Exams. I didn’t notice him. I couldn’t help it. Sasuke-baka was looking so damn hot, who the hell would notice him? He did eventually get my attention. When we first walked right into the first exam room, Neji and Lee decided that going deep into the room with other foreign ninjas was a grand idea.
Those bastards nearly made me wet myself. Like hell I was going to show that though. That was when he yelled. “Listen up you bastards! I’m Uzumaki Naruto and I won’t loose to ANY of you!” I couldn’t help but laugh, I felt weird being the only one laughing but relief washed over when I noticed a few other girls laughing as well. They must have been nervous being around other foreign shinobis as well.
He got my attention again during the written test. When I saw a large number of other people about to raise their hand and quit, he yelled again. His little speech gave those little spineless cowards a confidence boost and ended up having that …woman.. Complaining about how many students were still left. I remember once believing Sasuke-baka to be cute. In the Forest of Death, that got shot down to hell. Lee, as usual was an idiot and nearly got himself killed fighting those Sound-nin. Before Neji had a chance to step in, Sasuke-baka was glowing purple and had black tattoos all over his body. At first, I thought it was kinda fruity, until he went nuts. The way he attacked and disabled that loud mouthed Sound-nin was horrifying. He even enjoyed it. If there’s one thing I hate more, it’s anyone enjoying hurting other people. Its one thing to do your job, but you know you’re going a bit overboard when you enjoy doing things like that. I then spotted Naruto on the ground unconscious. I had this weird squirmy jerk deep down, but I shook it off and left. When Neji was fighting in the preliminaries.. Naruto…He stood out again defending someone be didn’t even knew that well. Never remembered anyone, let alone Naruto defend Hinata. I thought it was sweet. Gai-sensei was over there crying muttering something about why couldn’t Naruto have been on his team instead of Neji. Men. Still, I was actually agreeing with him for once. Neji was so cruel in that fight… Poor Hinata...Then there were the finals. I felt so sorry for him. Someone so spirited to get pitted up against Neji of all people. I felt guilty for helping Neji develop the Kaiten, but since I didn’t know Naruto all that well I helped him anyway. Besides, I was still fairly infatuated with Neji at the time. But that gradually disappeared. I didn’t even get a thank you for my help. It was a little hard watching the fight. Naruto couldn’t even lay a finger on him. I’m pretty sure everyone gasped when they figured out Naruto’s clones weren’t normal ones. They were solid. Hell, I was so jealous. That’s supposed to be a kinjutsu! How could he have learned it? Anyway, I guessed Neji was getting bored with just pummeling him so he used his blood limit’s specialty. After I saw him get into that stance I didn’t pay much attention. Just when I thought it was all over..So what I doubted? That wasn’t the first time Neji did that. Everyone he did that to, they couldn’t even stand, let alone fight. Naruto had done the impossible. He summoned chakra, bizarre chakra at that, even though Neji closed up his Tenkutsu points. I was baffled. I couldn’t even ask Gai-sensei, the weird old coot wasn’t ever around when I wanted him to be! The shock and frustration was so much, I didn’t even realize Naruto managed to heal all of his cuts and bruises. Then he got fast. Real fast. I didn’t even see a blur when he moved. I then spotted Naruto rushing Neji head on. I was thinking it was all over, getting knocked with one of his Kaitens that close was a one-hit knockout. After the huge explosion, it looked like Neji won. I couldn’t have been more wrong. The ground seemed to just spit up something orange and you could barely make out Naruto knocking Neji in the chin. And won. With one hit! How unbelievable is that! After staring at them with my mouth hanging out for God knows how long, I was expecting Naruto to start rubbing it in. But..Naruto didn’t gloat. He didn’t look at Neji with disgust, or trashed talk him while he was down. He just pranced around like a little kid, like he just got invited to a party or something.
Right there. I fell for him right there. I think. Emotions are difficult things to understand. Maybe it was because of his strength? His dorky personality? He is rather funny. You don’t see too many shinobi with a sense of humor now days. They tend to get perverted. Or just plain twisted. Meh. And as time grew on I grew subtly more obsessed with him. Okay maybe not obsessed, but definitely more attracted to the blonde. My greatest hero, Tsunade-sama, was brought back to Konoha to become Godaime. Rumor was it that Naruto had been traveling with Tsunade-sama’s old teammate Jiraiya just to go look for her. I didn’t believe it until I saw Naruto walking with him and Tsunade-sama. She even looked fond of him, it was brief and disappeared as fast as it appeared, but I saw it. All that did was make me yearn for him more. All those “Dead-last” remarks seem so stupid now. Would a “dead-last” looser be traveling around with two sannin? Jiraiya was probably training him too. He was already strong.. Just how strong would he get with Jiraiya training him? Jiraiya was the one who taught Yondaime after all…The next couple of days was a blur. Well, not really, I managed to befriend Shizune. That’s a plus. Big plus. Still, it was really confusing that week.
Rumors.
Gossip.
The last Uchiha defected.
The demon’s fault.
Just who the hell was the demon?
Uzumaki Naruto?
Lies…
He’s not a demon…
Retrieval mission?
THAT BUM MADE CHUUNIN?
HE’S LEADING THE SQUAD?
Mission failed?
I learned all that in one day. It gave me a damn headache. I was loitering around the gates when it was suddenly opened to admit Kakashi with something orange and red on his back. My heart skipped a beat when I saw him. He looked dead to the world. The red I saw was blood all over him. With a feeble squeak, and berating myself for my Hinata-like behavior, I bolted to the hospital. I remembered Neji being brought here earlier so I thought I’d visit him, at least that was the reason I told myself I was going there. At the hospital, I spotted Shizune-san. She looked extremely tired. Slumped on the couch like that, you’d think someone told her that her mother died. “Tired?” I asked softly. She wasn’t exactly sleeping, but I think I could have gotten away with giving her the finger. “To a certain extent, yes.” She retorted, a bit snippy I might add. She gestured her hand towards the empty seat besides her. “Sit.” She droned. I didn’t have the heart to say no, so I complied. I didn’t know what to say, having not knowing her for long, but the silence was comfortable. Shizune turned towards me and was about to speak when Kakashi busted through the front door. Shizune immediately stood up and ran over to Kakashi, who was talking to some nurse. I didn’t want to seem rude so I stayed put. Kakashi must have said something rude since the nurse looked really annoyed. Shizune was eavesdropping on the conversation and looked like she was about to hit the nurse.. “What sort of nurse are you!” With that, she took Naruto from Kakashi and stormed off to the upper floor rooms. I tried to follow but that damn receptionist wouldn’t allow it. But me being me, I simply placed a Genjutsu on myself to look like a doctor and walked passed her. She didn’t even give me a second glance. Great. Just great. I don’t know what room he’s in. I nodded to a few nurses and doctors until I spotted Shizune walking out of one of the rooms. I was just about to walk in when Tsunade and Sakura rounded a corner. I hadn’t spoken to her yet, so you can’t blame me since I was staring at her slack jawed. She noticed me staring but ignored me and went in. I’m pretty sure she saw through my genjutsu, but I guess she was too busy to care. I checked Naruto’s clipboard on his door read he was fine. I breathed a sigh of relief. Right when I dropped the disguise I bumped into Gai-sensei. “Ah, Tenten. Visiting your teammates? If only those too fireballs could be as supportive as you.” He sighed and walked off before I could even respond. I glanced at a clock and grimaced. It was well over 9:00pm. I found Neji’s room simply enough, but the guy was asleep. With a yawn I decided to go home. Regretted like hell the next day. The next morning I vowed to at least speak to him. On second thought, I better visit my own teammates first since I didn’t even talked to either of them yesterday. I remembered what room Neji was in so I just asked a nurse nearby to make sure he was in. I let myself in the door and stifled a gasp. Neji never looks content, yet there he was, lying in the bed without a care in the world. He hasn’t even noticed me yet! Or at least, it seemed like it.. “How are you?” I ventured, afraid I might take him out of one of his “rare” moments. “My left part of my body is numb. They said it is an after effect of the healing seals they used.” He still was looking rather content, and he still hasn’t looked at me yet!
“Oh. Seen Lee around? Is he alright?”
“He went somewhere with Gai-sensei. He’s doing fine as well.” He finally looks at me, with a hint of a smile there as well. About bloody time, if you ask me. Rude to not look at someone when they’re talking to you. I guess I can forgive that though, I have no idea what sort of fight he went through….
“How long are you gonna stay in here?”
“Hiashi-sama is supposed to pick me up soon.”
I grinned. “Mister Top Rookie needs to be taken home by his uncle?” Neji flushed.
“No. Tenten,” He hesitated, not exactly sure what to say next, ”… I won’t be with the team often this year.”
“Hm? Why, what’s wrong?”
“Nothing is wrong. Hiashi-sama is just taking me under his wing for a while.”
“Oh. You’re still going to do lame old missions with us, right?”
He changed positions so that he was sitting up and staring blankly at the window.
“I don’t know.”
“You make it seem so depressing. It’s not as if you’re going to leave the village or something.” If he was, I vowed to kill him on spot. Leaving me alone with Gai-sensei and Lee. Grr..
“I may not be leaving, but someone I know is.” He turns to look at me, with an annoying smirk stretched across his face. “Uzumaki, Naruto.”
“He’s WHAT!” I nearly fell over. Byakugan or no Byakugan I’m so going to squeeze the life out of him if he’s just jerkin’ around. He frowns. “I thought you knew? You still might be able to catch him.. before he leaves. He could still be at the gates..”
He might have said something else, but I was already out the door. Now that I think about it, it was in a small tiny way, funny. It took me three weeks later to realize that he knew I got over him and knew who was currently running in my brain.
While running, my traitorous mind kept telling me I was stupid. Chasing some guy who most likely doesn’t even remember my name. Neji seemed like a new person. You should still be all over him. Stupid brain. There is no point in pining after someone with little to no feelings towards you anyway. It’s just a waist of time. Besides, guys like Naruto were one in a million. By the time I got there I was too late. He’s gone and for who knows how long. I spent the rest of the day moping around with Lee and Gai-sensei. I didn’t really show it, we’re supposed to do that anyway, but it felt so weird giving a fake smile to everyone.. Working with Gai and Lee was cruel. Overly cruel. I had to drag myself home. I appreciated Neji’s company hell of a lot more after that. My parents left an official looking letter addressed to me on my table. I scanned it and there was supposed to be a meeting with Godaime next week. The letter didn’t say what it was about.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------------
I arrived at the meeting early. There were a large number of people here. Most of the Genins, about half of the Chuunins, and about a third of Jounins, and higher ups. I even saw some normal civilians. I spotted Lee in the crowd and walked over to him. Who could miss him? “Ah Tenten-chan! Glorious morning, is it not?” Loud as usual. Its good to know some things never change. “Yeah sure thing Lee-kun..” I didn’t see Tsunade-sama around so I got bored rather quickly. “Tenten, wake up! Hokage-sama is about to speak.” Lee whispered. I was instantly awake. When did I dose off?
“Good morning everyone. Lets get straight to the point, shall we? I know of the rumors spreading like wild fire, and quite honestly, it’s irritating to hear them. As you all know, last week there was a retrieval mission for a defected nin. With experienced shinobi low, I was forced into sending a team consisting of a newly selected Chuunin and four Genins. Though they were all handpicked.”
She allowed the crowd to murmur a bit.
“In the last moment, Sand’s peace offering arrived in the form of three of their top Genins. I sent them to aid them as well. Without their help, there is no doubt that we would have lost some of the village’s most promising shinobis.”
More murmuring.
She cleared her throat. “The defected nin was none other than Uchiha Sasuke. He left with four sound nin escorts. Not Uzumaki, Naruto. Uzumaki was part of the team sent to retrieve him.”
“That’s ludicrous! This Uchiha is nothing like his brother! This one even saved us from Shukaku the Sand Demon during the Sand and Sound attack! Its that..that..Uzumaki! He must have done something to delude the Uchiha!” Yelled a Chuunin, a large number of other people agreed with him. I wanted to smack him. So rude. There was a muffled scream. All eyes was on the disrespectful as the Chuunin was choked to death by ..sand? I gasped, Gaara? ANBU looked ready to attack but Tsunade-sama waved them off. Gaara was nonchalantly staring at the offending Chuunin. Still as intimidating as ever. How the hell did I not notice him before? Looking at him, he was dressed pretty normal. White long sleeved shirt and black pants tucked at the ankles. His siblings held a look of disgust on their face. It wasn’t directed at Gaara. “Gaara, put him down.” To be honest, Tsunade-sama didn’t look mad at him. It’s as if she forced herself to say that to him. “Sasuke Uchiha cannot and did not defeat me.” With that he calmly walked out, siblings in route. Lee raised his hand. Tsunade-sama nodded towards him. “Hokage-sama, if Uchiha did not defeat Gaara, who did?”
“See for yourself. Complimentary of Jiraiya of course.” She pulled out a scroll, unraveled it, did a few hand seals, and suddenly a picture showed from the scroll. Almost like a projector. You could tell you were looking through a scope of some sort from the way the boundaries was set. Everyone watched in silent horror as Gaara transformed into some sort of brown ugly thing. Everyone gasped when Sasuke, with those freakish black tattoos struck Gaara in his right shoulder with the Chidori and shake it off like it was a fly. Just when it looked like Sasuke was done for, Sakura appeared which made Gaara distracted enough to get a fist slammed into him by Naruto. Gaara swiped Naruto away and slammed Sakura into a tree. This seemed to really piss Naruto off. They were talking, but we couldn’t hear. It was a tad frustrating. I swear I saw the council, Kakashi-san, and Tsunade-sama smile when Naruto poked Gaara in the ass with a kunai and literally blew his ass up when the explosive note went off. Neji smirked. What a second, when did Neji get here? Must have been when I dozed off...
“I’m glad I didn’t take anyone hostage when I fought him.” He chuckled.
Everyone who heard gave a nervous but genuine laugh.
Gaara must have said something to piss Naruto off again. The Kage Bunshin was already an amazing feat already, but to have made THAT many was astonishing. Despite the pounding those clones did, Gaara did the unthinkable. He got huge.Really huge.The view changed and we were now all staring at someone’s foot.
“Shit. I better go help.” That someone said. Must have been Jiraiya.
“Heh..Maybe not…”
The perspective shifted again and we were all staring at a huge cloud of smoke.
There were a lot of gasps in the crowd. Wasn’t all that surprising really. There aren’t too many in the world that can call themselves a summoner. I was more than impressed to say the least. Neji stiffened. “He was holding back..” He whispered. He took a deep breath. It must have been a major blow to his ego to go all at it at someone to not only get the shit beat out of you, but to know they weren’t even using their full potential? Ouchies. I saw Kakashi-san’s eyes widened a bit. Why would his own sensei be surprised of his own pupil? Jiraiya said something again. “Sheesh. Gamabunta two times in a row.” There were startled gasps again. Wasn’t it Gamabunta the toad boss that helped Yodaime defeat the Nine-Tails? It was amazing to see the summoned toad battle it out with Gaara. What happened next I doubt anyone saw it coming. The toad transformed into the Nine-Tails. I thought it was just a regular fox at first, but its hard to miss nine swaying tails. No one knew why until they saw it bite and dig into Gaara. Naruto leapt off the transformed toad and gave Gaara a savage blow to the head that should have put him back into unconsciousness after waking him up, seeing what it did to Neji after all...A head butt later, the scrolled sealed it self-back up and the lights were turned back on. Didn’t even notice it was turned off in the first place.
“Now that we got that cleared up we can finally get down to business.” Tsunade-sama stated smugly, then turning to glare at those idiots from before.
“As of today, Uchiha Sasuke is a missing nin. He is to be treated like any other traitor of a village. If he is seen, do not attempt to engage with him unless you’re certain you can take him. If not, just file the standard report for spotting them.”
I was even more flustered when after seeing how powerful he actually is, some people resented him even more. I hate people with ego trips like that. On the way back home from the mission with Raiga, Naruto pulled me aside and asked me what my goal was. I told him and he started to laugh, it ticked me off at first, what he said next stopped me dead.

"You honestly beleave that hogwash about men being stronger than weman? Get real, the guy who started that was as idot.It dosen't matter what anyone elese says or thinks, its how hard you work that determans how good you are."

Kami-san...can I keep him?
113.title: TenTen

114.content:
The story here is were Ino, Sakura, & Hinata are adults, who are the teachers of Naruto's class. They are looking were looking for boy toy they could have sex with any time they want & fortunately for them found thier toy, who well be Naruto.

So which POV would you like to see Naruto be raped from?
114.title: Boy Toy

12.content: Welcome to the ninja world of the future! Well, two and half years to be exact so choose a story.
12.title: Naruto Shippuden's debut

choices: Karin & Naruto vs. Kiba & Akamaru (in a shinobi/ninja animal team competition)
Karin has second thoughts and lets Naruto rest
To Karin's displeasure, Hinata arrives and demands she be given Naruto
121.content:
Karin got up and yawned, then got into her usual outfit consisting of her brown glasses, violet long-sleeved shirt, short black shorts, long black leggings and black ninja-sandals. Nodding to herself, Karin smiled. Time to check on her favorite prisoner! She wasn't sure just how he'd been transformed into a fox kit with bloody crimson-red fur, something to do with Danzo, Homura, and Koharu trying to rekindle the hate towards him for they're own benefit. He'd been half-dead from exhaustion against Madara Uchiha and in his Jinchuuriki-Sage mode, and something they'd did that was SUPPOSE to be lethal just transformed him. So Karin was keeping him as her pet until there was a way to change him back. She called him her favorite prisoner because keeping him reminded her of when she was running the base full of prisoners back when she was working for Orochimaru. As she stopped in front of the kennel he was kept in, Karin smiled. His chakra was really warm, filled with kindness and caring.

"Wakie-wakie Naruto,"
121.title: Karin

choices: Hinata wins and gets Naruto back
Hinata wins but Karin gets the last laugh
1213.content:
Karin was just about to figure out what to do with Naruto today but then an explosion occurred and a ninja wearing some interesting clothing appeared. Karin was about to question why she was here but this intruder already answered her question with "Give Naruto back!" with a powerful resolve in her eyes or maybe it was something else.

Karin was a bit surprised at this girl sudden appearance but even more so, she knew that she had Naruto which got her curious about her name. She was about to ask but it was like she read her mind and said "If you don't give Naruto back, I, Hyuga Hinata, shall defeat you in a most painful manner!" with the same confidence.

Karin once again decided that she needed to be taken care of but she knows where their base is so this Hinata person can't get away with this knowledge. Karin then realized that the others aren't going to be back for at least three days. She then knew that she needed to improvise. She then attacks Hinata in hopes of finding a weak point...

1323.title: Other

choices: He gets called up for a job
13231.content:
"Heh. A week after the Fourth war and Sakura votes to have me banished. " Naruto said.

He still wore his hitai-ite, but now it was around his neck, and it had an upside-down crucifix scratched over the Konoha symbol. He wore a black denim trench-coat over an open black hoodie, which was worn over a blood red mesh shirt. He now wore a pair of black kackhis and matching combat boots with silver studs on the toes. His hands were covered by a pair of black fingerless gloves. His sword, which was strapped to his back, was slim, yet large and slender at the same time. The blade itself was a pure onyx black, but at its very edges, the faintest trace of red could be seen. This was it's aura. The hilt itself was inlaid with a red dragon's crest, in laid against the black wrapping of the hilt. It would have to be a longsword at best guess. And what a sword it was. It's entire form seemed to pulsate and pine for his touch.

Naruto was in the Devil-hunter business now. Damn good at it too.

Just then...
13231.title: Naruto with guns and swords? Ho I am SO not pas...

choices: Naruto going to Shirokin High when one of the teachers is hiding she's a yakuza?
GOD NO! I DON'T EVEN WANNA THINK ABOUT ALL THE WAYS THAT CAN GO WRONG!

13232.title: Ninja, High school, & a yakuza heiress 4 a teacher

choices: Naruto goes to get his schedule and finds he's in Class 2-4 for homeroom
132321.content:
A new student made his way to Shirokin High. He was dressed in a open black coat with a white interior and the sleeves rolled up to his elbows and had a orange spiral on the back, a white button-up shirt with the top three buttons undone, black pants, a orange sash acting as a belt, a black cloth headband with an orange spiral on it. Hey, in his own defence, he felt naked without the color orange.

Naruto sighed, to think the four Kages in the Alliance (not that he'd EVER consider Danzo as Hokage anyways even if the shrivelled-up bastard WAS part of the alliance, thereby making it five Kages) had used a jutsu to send him into another dimension to keep him from getting captured by Madara. So here he was, forced to attend this Shirokin place because he couldn't provide his educational records. School...just the word made him gag. A universal plague if you asked him. As he stepped into the courtyard, Naruto looked up to see a teacher looking at him through a window.

He could feel that teacher had a secret.

15.title: Expanding your horizons

151.content:
I'll take a whack at this:

Name: Kaizo Kontyo
Age: 10
Gender: Female
Nicknames: "The Demon of the Village" "Little Demon"
Species: 1/4th kitsune, 1/4th oni, 1/2 human.
Description: (3ft, 11 inches at the beginning of this story, 7ft, 4 inches at its end) Two small (at first) horns are laced above her ears, but they aren't at the top of her head (Think of Suika from Touhou), but are hidden in her long, red hair. Has two kitsune tails (Eventually six) that can act like a second pair of hands. Kaizo wears a pair of shackles on her hands and feet, due to the people of Konoha trying to sacrifice her. (Really was a murder in disguise) She wears a uwagi with a hood to cover her head, along with a sarashi to cover her chest. (As a teen, she is really sensitive about this fact) She also wears a lower part of a gi colored green, and wears loose socks, but rarely wears shoes.

Personality: Kaizo is very upbeat, which is very surprising considering the fact that the townspeople try to kill her on a daily basis. She won't attack anyone that talks to her. Kaizo WILL attack if either she is allowed to or if someone attacks one of her friends. Kaizo is very smart, due to her background.

Powers & Techniques: Kaizo can break a person's bones if she wanted to. With her tails, she can perform Fox Fire, a multi-purpose move that has gotten her out of trouble more than a few times. (She will learn more powers as the story continues) Later in her life, Kaizo will wield a kanabō. In the meantime though, she is currently skilled in: (Note: the techniques named are the Kihon, or "basics" and are easily readable.) Atemi, bunkai, kuzushi, judo, and Kuji-kir.
151.title: Create your story

info.brief_description: this is a place for all those adventurers and romance lovers. Enjoy!
info.description:
This is a haven for stories involving naruto (except gays) You can do a story about anybody and you are not limited to just the cast of Naruto and you

can use fan characters for this.

I want you to make stories for people to enjoy so have fun! You can also use characters from other animes but you must provide a reason as to why

the crossover happened later in your story.
